name: SHOCKLANE
description:
In this fast-paced racing game, play as an aggressive vehicle, switch between elements and collide into your opponents to win the race!

Local Multiplayer Game

 


  • A collision-focused gameplay for a unique blend between fighting and racing genres.
  • A tactical dimension with the SWITCH between the 3 elements.
  • An eccentric artistic direction.
  • Dazzling OST with interactive music, by the talented French producer Narumik.

C O N T R O L S

C R E D I T S

This game has been made in 3 months by a team of 6 students from the Cnam-Enjmin.

Game Designers : Théophile Dreux, Martin Rabiller
Programmer : Baptiste Rousserie
2D & 3D Artist : Pierre Espaignet
Sound Designer & Composer: Martin Rabiller
UX & UI Designer : Valentin Posadas
Producer : Elisa Lowy
